bobby.upgrade.required: [Bobby] Den här världen innehåller data från en gammal version av Minecraft. Kör `/bobby upgrade` för att upgradera den
bobby.upgrade.fallback_world: [Bobby] Din fallback-värld innehåller data från en gammal version av Minecraft. Upgradera den från "Enspelarläge" menyn genom "Redigera" -> "Optimera Värld" inställningen.
bobby.upgrade.not_enabled: Bobby är inte aktiverad för denna värld.
bobby.upgrade.begin: [Bobby] Upgraderar världdata till nuvarande Minecraft version. Det här kan ta några minuter.
bobby.upgrade.done: [Bobby] World data upgrade complete. Your old chunks should now be visible again.
tooltip.option.bobby.no_block_entities:
Do not load block entities (e.g. chests) in fake chunks.
These need updating every tick which can add up.

Enabled by default because the render distance for block entities is usually smaller than the server-view distance anyway.
tooltip.option.bobby.taint_fake_chunks: Reduces the light levels in fake chunks so you can tell the difference from real ones.
tooltip.option.bobby.unload_delay:
Delays the unloading of chunks which are outside your view distance.
Saves you from having to reload all chunks when
leaving an area for a short moment (e.g. cut scenes).
Does not work across dimensions.
tooltip.option.bobby.delete_unused_regio:
Delete regions from the cache when they have not been loaded for X days.

The cache for a given world is cleaned up whenever you disconnect from the server.
Entire worlds are cleaned up when the game starts and you have not visited them for X days.

Set to -1 to disabled.
Set to 0 to clean up everything after every disconnect.
tooltip.option.bobby.max_render_distance:
Changes the maximum value configurable for Render Distance.

Requires Sodium.
tooltip.option.bobby.view_distance_overw:
Overwrites the view-distance of the integrated server.
This allows Bobby to be useful in Singleplayer.

Disabled when at 0.
Bobby is active in singleplayer only if this is enabled.
Requires re-log to en-/disable.
